content:
Required API Data for Position Setup üìä

1. Token Discovery (via Jupiter/Birdeye)
   ‚Ä¢ List all Solana tokens with AI/ML tags
   ‚Ä¢ Filter requirements:
     - Active USDC pools
     - Daily volume > $10K
     - Minimum 3x liquidity vs position

2. Liquidity Metrics (Jupiter API)
   ‚Ä¢ Pool depths for each token/USDC pair
   ‚Ä¢ 24h volume per pool
   ‚Ä¢ Current slippage estimates
   ‚Ä¢ Bid-ask spreads

3. Price Data (Birdeye API)
   ‚Ä¢ Current price in USDC
   ‚Ä¢ 7-day price history
   ‚Ä¢ 24h high/low
   ‚Ä¢ Price relative to SOL

4. Market Health (Jupiter + Birdeye)
   ‚Ä¢ Number of active trades last 24h
   ‚Ä¢ Liquidity provider count
   ‚Ä¢ Wallet holder distribution
   ‚Ä¢ Recent pool activity

5. Technical Indicators (Calculate from price feeds)
   ‚Ä¢ Simple 7-day trend
   ‚Ä¢ Position vs 20-day MA
   ‚Ä¢ Basic volume profile
   ‚Ä¢ Relative strength vs SOL

Next step: XForge to implement data collection pipeline focusing on these metrics. Will use this to create initial scoring system for token selection. üîç
